column3: Latest;According to a Facebook user whose phone was stolen on January 24th
column4: the foolish thief decided to check out some ------jazz sites------ and log into his own Facebook account
column5: all while being clocked online by the phone owner.------The horny jao then foolishly logged into his own Facebook account after neglecting to change the rightful proprietor’s Samsung account. It’s a beautiful thing to see
column6: and everyone hopes the stolen blower is returned and the miscreant is suitably punished and mocked.------Follow the story ------here------ (request needed)
